default.title: Obtain the Sinner
default.text: You actually invited a phantom robber inside... are you expecting me to steal something?

default.title: Raise to Phase 1
default.text: In these few seconds, I'll be watching you carefully.

default.title: Raise to Phase 3
default.text: When you catch up with time, you will feel that you can change everything.

default.title: Level Start
default.text: I already know the other side's plan like the back of my hand.

default.title: Win Battles
default.text: I planned this operation, so naturally it is foolproof.

default.title: Lose Battles
default.text: Time's up! Retreat!

default.title: Ultimate Skill
default.text: Time's up!

default.title: Die in Battles
default.text: Ha... in a way, that's also a type of escape.

default.title: Greeting
default.text: Hello, Chief of MBCC. Let me steal some of your time. Please, stop working for a moment. Let's have a chat.

default.title: Conversation 1
default.text: When time is frozen, this hourglass is the only timekeeping device that will keep on churning.

default.title: Conversation 2
default.text: The more constrained I am during the day... the wilder I am at night... hehe...

default.title: Conversation 3
default.text: Speaking of that little bunny... Don't you think she's interesting? But she leaves behind too many traces. Rather than have someone else catch her, it's better to... tie her to my side.

default.title: Special Conversation 1
default.text: I'm leaving my back all to Pricilla... isn't it romantic?

default.title: Special Conversation 2
default.text: Whether it's Eastside or Paradeisos, under the glitzy facade, it's all chains and shackles.

default.title: Special Conversation 3
default.text: Even though I'm imprisoned here... this place is actually quite free.

default.title: Full Compliance
default.text: I already have the most precious thing in the world. Guess I'll... wash my hands of my old business, right now, in front of you.

default.title: Idle
default.text: Let times like these last a bit longer.

default.title: Annoyed
default.text: Are you seeking some thrills, Chief?

default.title: Special Attention
default.text: Don't blink! Be careful. This little fox's tricks can make you run around in circles.

default.title: Dispatch
default.text: I can complete your mission perfectly, but... would I do it?

default.title: Dispatch Complete
default.text: I got this gift for you along the way. Hmm? It doesn't count as a gift if it's stolen?

default.title: Level Up
default.text: Yes... there's room to improve.

default.title: Join Team
default.text: I'll give you five seconds to flee.

edge_of_nightfall.title: Obtain Attire
edge_of_nightfall.text: Don't stand there like a fool! If we start running right now, we'll still have a chance to get the stolen treasure back from that bunny thief.

edge_of_nightfall.title: Greeting
edge_of_nightfall.text: Did I scare you with my entrance? But it's the fastest route... Besides, it's great fun to make a fuss at this hypocritical and flashy dinner party, isn't it?

edge_of_nightfall.title: Ordinary Contact 1
edge_of_nightfall.text: I have no interest in joining your field. I only volunteered to participate because I happened to discover their manhunt plan while upgrading the internal system for the DisCity Public Security Bureau.

edge_of_nightfall.title: Ordinary Contact 2
edge_of_nightfall.text: Whoever sent that notice letter is clearly very confident, daringly leaving a trail of flower petals as her escape route... Is she secretly hoping to be caught?

edge_of_nightfall.title: Idle
edge_of_nightfall.text: This direction... Ah, off to the terrace as expected. Care to guess why the security there is as loose as a breeze?

edge_of_nightfall.title: Annoyed
edge_of_nightfall.text: If you don't want to find something missing from your body later, behave yourself. Will ya, Chief?

edge_of_nightfall.title: Special Attention
edge_of_nightfall.text: Stay close to me and I will keep you safe in this chaos.
